file_content.text: The Eternal Throne. The new seat of power in the galaxy.
It can't be. I've only been gone--
Longer than you think. Zakuul has surpassed my expectations. The most powerful fleet in history, and an army of guardians who know the Force is more than light or dark.
But my children... my children abuse their power.
I'm surprised you have family.
Real children? Not puppets enslaved to your will?
They aren't like your "Children" I fought before. They have free will.
You were bad enough alone. We didn't need your relatives.
Never pegged you as a family man. Maybe it was all the planet-killing.
You sired offspring--and forgot that dynasties are built on the bones of their founders.
This is why Sith shouldn't reproduce. Killing an apprentice is hard enough.
How'd a charmer like you make babies? Cloning?
If you're so immortal, why go to the trouble of reproduction?
What did you expect? You're their role model.
They follow your example.
I was different here.
Your wife isn't around to keep them in line?
Where's their mother?
I made a mistake. I let her go.
Abandoning my past let me experience pleasures I denied myself before. I have known love on Zakuul. Who knows? Even you may find it.
The only thing you love is power.
You don't know what love is.
I care about more than you know.
I've had more than my share of lovers.
I have. Lots of times.
Temporary comforts. I speak of something higher.
I committed my life to someone. Your children forced us apart.
I already found love.
A reunion may yet be possible.
Anything's possible, but not while I'm in carbonite.
I suppose there's a chance.
It is something to consider.
Love leads to attachment--and that leads to the dark side.
Jedi cannot love.
Your thinking remains limited. A pity.
I won't find what I'm not looking for.
Love doesn't interest me.
You may surprise yourself.
We must deal with my errant son and daughter before they ruin everything.
Zakuul must fall with them.
It's not completely their fault. Zakuul is as corrupt as the Empire.
But the Eternal Fleet makes it infinitely more dangerous.
I won't stop with them. Your new empire won't replace mine.
Zakuul is not your enemy. They are.
I knew you wanted something. You can't stop them alone.
So that's why you're with me.
They are deadly--and worse, lack discipline.
They won't go gently, but I guess you can always make more.
I can kill them, if you want.
You want me to end your bloodline. Consider it done.
I'll kill them.
Do not underestimate their threat. It will take both of us to undo the damage they can inflict.
Your daughter sees me.
Your daughter's giving me the eye.
Vaylin was always my favorite.
What is it?
Interesting.
Vaylin, I need your help.
Hear my voice, Vaylin. Release me from the carbonite while there's time.
The Force guides us both, Vaylin. You must free me from the carbonite.
Lady, if you can hear me... I need out of the carbonite right now.
Your father isn't much help. Maybe you can get me out of the carbonite....
Hear my voice, child. Free me now, and I may be merciful.
That's right, focus on me. I want out of that carbonite tomb.
Hey, I'm talking to you. Get me out of the carbonite.
You can hear too, yes? I demand you free me from the carbonite.
Your daughter doesn't trust your son.
She keeps secrets from him.
She trusts no one.
It's an entertaining nightmare, but that's all.
No, it's just an illusion.
No, it is more.
I'm dying....
We are being reborn.
Wake up. We have to go....
